name: 3dSpaceTimeCorr
author: AFNI Developers
description: Calculates correlation coefficients between two 4D datasets using space+time patterns

inputs.description: Second 4D data set. Must have the same spatial dimensions and number of time points as insetA.
inputs.name: Input data set B

inputs.description: Optional mask for calculations. Recommended for speed and interpretability.
inputs.name: Mask file

inputs.description: Switch to output Fisher Z transform of spatial map correlation instead of Pearson r values.
inputs.name: Output Z-transformed correlation

inputs.description: Freeze the seed voxel location in the insetA data set using ijk indices while the seed location in insetB moves throughout the volume or mask. Provide three ijk values.
inputs.name: Freeze insetA ijk indices

inputs.description: Freeze the seed voxel location in the insetA data set using xyz coordinates while the seed location in insetB moves throughout the volume or mask. Provide three xyz values.
inputs.name: Freeze insetA xyz coordinates

output-files.description: Output data set with space-time correlation coefficients.
output-files.name: Output data set
